      • randomSize

        private static int randomSize()
        Create and return a random size between minSize and maxSize The probability that the return value is minSize + x is 1 / x^3
        Returns:
        an int in range [minSize, maxSize]

      • randomNutrition

        private float randomNutrition()
        Random nutrition value base on size, and default nutrition and NUTRITION_VARIANCE
        Returns:
        size * defaultNutrition +- NUTRITION_VARIANCE%
